body.name: Columbia Women's Benton Springs Full Zip
features: SOFT FABRIC: This Columbia Women's Benton Springs Full Zip fleece is crafted of soft 100% polyester MTR filament fleece for ultimate warmth.
HANDY FEATURES: This Columbia women's fleece jacket features two side zippered security pockets to keep your small items secure.
ULTIMATE COMFORT: With a collared neck and zippered closure, this Columbia women's fleece jacket is designed to give you ultimate comfort during cold winter days.
CLASSIC FIT: With a modern classic fit, Columbia's Benton Springs Full Zip Fleece is lightweight with an active cut for comfortable outdoor activity.
COLD-WEATHER ESSENTIAL: A full-zip closure and unbelievably soft fleece make this jacket an essential for cold weather.
body.description: There's nothing more necessary than a fleece layer in a women's outdoor winter wardrobe—that's why the Benton Springs Full Zip Fleece Jacket exists. Columbia's soft, winter-ready jacket is the ultimate warmth provider and the everyday style piece. Crafted of our super-soft 100% polyester MTR filament fleece, this Benton Springs Full Zip Fleece Jacket is the perfect layering piece and first line of defense to combat the cold. It contains a modern classic fit that allows for comfortable movement and zippered side pockets to keep your small items (including your hands) secure. An added bonus is the warm collar that's flexible so you can choose whether you want to wear it up or down, depending on your desired level of toastiness. Our Benton Springs Full Zip Fleece Jacket is available in many accommodating sizes and colors as well. To ensure the size you choose is right, utilize our sizing chart and the following measurement instructions: For the sleeves, start at the center back of your neck and measure across the shoulder and down to the sleeve. If you come up with a partial number, round up to the next even number. For the chest, measure at the fullest part of the chest, under the armpits and over the shoulder blades, keeping the tape measure firm and level.

productInformation.value: #371 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry) #1 in Women's Fleece Jackets & Coats

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this jacket - soft, warm, and lots of pockets.
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a lightweight jacket that would work for the cool weather of Spring and Fall. I am 5'2" and usually wear an X-Small or Small in a t-shirt depending on the brand. In most jeans, I wear a size 1. I really liked the burgundy color in this jacket, so I ordered a size small.Although the small fit, I didn't think it would work as a jacket - wanted something a bit looser. So, I decided to order this jacket in a medium. The replacement fit more like a jacket, which is what I wanted. I returned the size small and kept the medium. The pictures are me in the size medium. When choosing size to buy, there are a couple of things to consider. If you plan to wear it as a light jacket over a t-shirt, your normal size will work fine - especially if you plan to leave it unzipped. The sleeves are not snug at all and a little long for me, but fit comfortably with elastic at the wrist. The inside pockets are large enough to carry a cell phone, a checkbook, or a wallet. If you plant to wear this as a jacket and especially if you plan to keep anything in the inside pockets while zipped, it would be a good idea to order one size up. Anything in the pockets will show bulges on the outside if you order your normal size and zip the jacket. It isn't fitted at the waist, but that's one of the things I like about it. When it isn't zipped, it doesn't flare out around the hips. The jacket also has a drawstring at the bottom if you want to pull it in at the hips.So, what do I love about this jacket?1) Very soft and lightweight, yet warm.2) Can be worn as a jacket for chilly weather outdoors or inside in the winter when the house is cool.3) Has 2 zippered pockets on the outside large enough to keep a wallet or small essentials.4) Has 2 deep pocket on the inside to carry a cell phone checkbook, wallet, or other items of similar size.5) It doesn't have a hood which can get in the way if you have long hair, and really isn't necessary indoors or in mild weather. 6) The collar stays down and does not have to be up around the neck. 7) The zipper works great and is not at all stiff or hard to zipper.I initially bought the Bark color, which is dark brown, to figure out the size I liked best. Since I like this jacket so much, I put 4 more colors on my wish list for Christmas - rich wine (burgundy), charcoal heather (dark grey), burnt orange (can't find color name), and a medium grey (can't find color name). My husband bought all of them probably thinking I would return a couple of them. I love them all and they go with different outfit colors. So I kept them all.In conclusion, I would definitely recommend this jacket. I hope this review was helpful for you. I will update it if my opinion changes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great jacket but size up
reviews.reviewText: This is a great jacket but runs small because it is fitted. I ordered a size up and am glad I did. It looks smart and is very warm and cozy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: "charcoal heather"is a lovely color. I like the jacket overall. It is soft and warm. considering the quality, the price is fair.It is true to size. I am 5' 8" and 132 and used the proposed measurement and bought the medium petite that fits great. happy purchasing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Well fitted and warm
reviews.reviewText: I saw this on sale and wanted a warm jacket for cooler days. I purchased a large so that I could wear it over a light sweater and the fit is perfect. I’ve got the extra room to move without any tightness across the back and it doesn’t restrict my movement. I was only disappointed that the color selection was limited due to the sale. Colors I would typically buy were not available. But that says something about the product….. being in high demand! Go for it!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for slightly longer arms
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my granddaughter approximately 5’2”, 90lbs, slightly longer arms, it fits her perfectly. I wear the same size but for me the arms are a little too long. She wanted a solid dark grey, no extra colors, the closest I could find was dark shadow, it’s a lovely dark blue grey, she was very happy across the board.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great gift for Mom
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this jacket for my elderly mom who is always chilly. She’s about 5’1 and wears an XL and the XL was perfect for her. I rolled up the sleeves a bit and off she went! The back of the jacket just covered her backside and wasn’t too long. It’s soft and cozy and not too thick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I Like the quality of this jacket. It's thin but warm. The stitching is great it looks like a more expensive coat. I'm quite pleased with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Most comfortable warm jacket ever! true to size LOVE these!
reviews.reviewText: Ok, I’ll admit, when I find a garment that fits me great and is extremely comfortable I tend to become obsessed with it. I own 6 of these and I love all of the colors, especially the Lily red, the colors are so beautiful. I wear these every day from early Fall to late Spring, they are my go to jackets for my mountain hikes, park walks and all my daily outdoor activities. The fit is true and I can move in this jacket. I love that the neck zips into a turtleneck. The side pockets have a zipper which I love and this even has an interior pouch for my gloves, also by Columbia. I’ve tried Amazon brand and several others and they are not nearly the fabric or fit of Columbia, you get what you pay for. I am 5’9” 158 and the large fits me perfect with room to move. I was worried about the length, it looks short in some of the photos but it’s not at all, it just above my crotch, perfect length and my broad shoulders have plenty of room across the back, no pulling anywhere, I love this jacket and dare you to choose just one! Highly recommend!Note: the black was not jet black, it’s almost a very dark grey, just so you know. All the other colors I got were true to the pics.

reviews.reviewTitle: La tela es más delgada de lo que imaginé.
reviews.reviewText: Es bonita, pero muy delgada su tela, no creo que sea suficiente para el frío de otoño e invierno.
Me encantó tela calientita, talla correcta excelente producto lo volvería a comprar!!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Muy corriente la tela, exijo devolución
reviews.reviewText: No me gusto la chamarra por la tela demasiado corriente es más debería de regresarla y reclamar al fabricanteCómo le puedo hacer ?Le agradecería si me apoya

reviews.reviewTitle: Los productos seleccionados han sido de excelente calidad
reviews.reviewText: Los productos seleccionados en mis compras han sido de excelente calidad y buen precio
